content.text: Good thanks, I'm writing a book about strong female characters in movies. Do you have any favorite movies with strong female characters?
I love strong female characters! I really enjoyed Wonder Woman in the new movie.
Me too! She's such a badass. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play Dungeons and Dragons, I also like to ride horses.
Horses are awesome! I used to ride them when I was younger. Do you have a favorite kind of horse?
I love Arabians! They're so beautiful and graceful.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to pamper myself, I get massages and facials a lot. I also enjoy cooking and playing video games.
I love cooking too! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making pasta dishes, especially lasagna.
Lasagna is so good! I love making it too.
